lyric:
[00:01.000]My lover's got humor
[00:03.850]She's the giggle at a funeral
[00:06.660]Knows everybody's disapproval
[00:09.510]I should've worshiped her sooner
[00:12.310]If the Heavens ever did speak
[00:15.270]She's the last true mouth piece
[00:18.230]Every Sunday's getting more bleak
[00:21.080]A fresh poison each week
[00:23.980]We were born sick, you heard them say it
[00:27.880]My church offers no absolutes
[00:30.480]She tells me 'worship in the bedroom'
[00:33.340]The only heaven I'll be sent to
[00:36.140]Is when I'm alone with you
[00:39.040]I was born sick, but I love it
[00:42.600]Command me to be well
[00:49.260]Amen. Amen. Amen
[00:57.170]Take me to church
[00:58.620]I'll worship like a dog
[01:00.470]At the shrine of your lie
[01:02.370]I'll tell you my sins
[01:03.970]and you can sharpen your knife
[01:05.980]Offer me that deathless heaven
[01:08.870]Good god, let me give you my life
[01:11.980]Take me to church
[01:13.530]I'll worship like a dog
[01:15.330]at the shrine of your lies
[01:17.200]I'll tell you my sins
[01:18.950]and you can sharpen your knife
[01:20.960]Offer me that deathless death
[01:23.760]Good god, let me give you my life
[01:28.320]If I'm a pagan of the good times
[01:31.170]My lover's the sunlight
[01:33.820]To keep the goddess on my side
[01:36.590]She demands a sacrifice
[01:39.470]To drain the whole sea
[01:41.180]Get something shiny
[01:43.030]Something meaty for the main course
[01:46.080]That's a fine looking high horse
[01:48.630]What you got in the stable?
[01:51.630]We've a lot of starving faithful
[01:54.440]That looks tasty
[01:55.840]That looks plenty
[01:57.890]This is hungry work
[01:59.940]Take me to church
[02:01.890]I'll worship like a dog
[02:03.640]at the shrine of your lies
[02:05.540]I'll tell you my sins
[02:07.140]so you can sharpen your knife
[02:09.040]Offer me my deathless death
[02:11.930]Good god, let me give you my life
[02:15.030]Take me to church
[02:16.690]I'll worship like a dog
[02:18.490]at the shrine of your lies
[02:20.440]I'll tell you my sins
[02:22.140]so you can sharpen your knife
[02:24.000]Offer me my deathless death
[02:26.850]Good god, let me give you my life
[02:31.900]No masters or kings
[02:34.450]when the ritual begins
[02:38.120]There is no sweeter innocence
[02:42.380]than our gentle sin
[02:45.730]In the madness and soil of
[02:49.440]that sad earthly scene
[02:53.040]Only then I am human
[02:56.860]Only then I am clean
[03:07.470]Amen. Amen. Amen
[03:17.680]Take me to church
[03:19.030]I'll worship like a dog
[03:20.580]at the shrine of your lies
[03:22.580]I'll tell you my sins
[03:24.280]and you can sharpen your knife
[03:26.390]Offer me that deathless death
[03:29.190]Good god, let me give you my life
[03:32.430]Take me to church
[03:33.880]I'll worship like a dog
[03:35.430]at the shrine of your lies
[03:37.590]I'll tell you my sins
[03:39.190]and you can sharpen your knife
[03:41.450]Offer me that deathless death
[03:44.650]Good god, let me give you my life
tlyric:
[00:01.000]我的爱人虽然风趣
[00:03.850]主也不该在他的葬礼上嬉笑
[00:06.660]深知世人容不下我们
[00:09.510]早该对主心怀敬意
[00:12.310]如果苍天也曾言语
[00:15.270]而主代表最终真理
[00:18.230]每场礼拜都愈加冷酷
[00:21.080]新的毒物周周孕育
[00:23.980]我们天生罪孽 人们这么说起
[00:27.880]我的教义里没有绝对真理
[00:30.480]但主告诉我 时刻都要祷告
[00:33.340]对我而言真的天堂
[00:36.140]就是与爱人相伴
[00:39.040]我天生残缺 但我乐意
[00:42.600]圣谕令我 须成完璧
[00:49.260]阿门
[00:57.170]带我去教堂
[00:58.620]我会像只忠犬
[01:00.470]将你的谎言奉若神明
[01:02.370]供诉我的所有罪孽
[01:03.970]你大可磨刀霍霍
[01:05.980]赐予我永生的死亡
[01:08.870]主啊 让我把生命献给你
[01:11.980]带我去教堂
[01:13.530]我会像只忠犬
[01:15.330]对你的谎言顶礼膜拜
[01:17.200]供诉我的所有罪孽
[01:18.950]你大可磨刀霍霍
[01:20.960]我的亡魂将永存于此
[01:23.760]主啊 请接受我卑微的生命
[01:28.320]若鼎盛之世我为异端
[01:31.170]我的爱人便是阳光
[01:33.820]为得主垂怜
[01:36.590]需要做出献祭
[01:39.470]排尽汪洋
[01:41.180]只为一祭
[01:43.030]圣桌上的血肉
[01:46.080]是我高大英俊的爱人
[01:48.630]主你又从中得到了什么
[01:51.630]我们不过是信仰的受害者
[01:54.440]而你就是刀俎
[01:55.840]我们沦为鱼肉
[01:57.890]这饥渴的屠杀
[01:59.940]带我去教堂
[02:01.890]我会像只忠犬
[02:03.640]将你的谎言奉若神明
[02:05.540]供诉我的所有罪孽
[02:07.140]你大可磨刀霍霍
[02:09.040]赐予我永生的死亡
[02:11.930]主啊 让我把生命献给你
[02:15.030]带我去教堂
[02:16.690]我会像只忠犬
[02:18.490]将你的谎言奉若神明
[02:20.440]供诉我的所有罪孽
[02:22.140]你大可磨刀霍霍
[02:24.000]我的亡魂将永存于此
[02:26.850]主啊 请接受我卑微的生命
[02:31.900]世间再无君主
[02:34.450]一旦仪式开始
[02:38.120]我们犯下的罪
[02:42.380]不过是无辜者的温存
[02:45.730]满布疯狂之下
[02:49.440]漫撒悲土之间
[02:53.040]彼时 我才是你们所谓的正常人
[02:56.860]唯此 我才能洗净你所谓的罪孽
[03:07.470]阿门
[03:17.680]带我去教堂
[03:19.030]我会像只忠犬
[03:20.580]将你的谎言奉若神明
[03:22.580]供诉我的所有罪孽
[03:24.280]你大可磨刀霍霍
[03:26.390]我的亡魂将永存于此
[03:29.190]主啊 请接受我卑微的生命
[03:32.430]带我去教堂
[03:33.880]我会像只忠犬
[03:35.430]将你的谎言奉若神明
[03:37.590]供诉我的所有罪孽
[03:39.190]你大可磨刀霍霍
[03:41.450]我的亡魂将永存于此
[03:44.650]主啊 请赐我这罪人一死
